author: Raja Abdulrahim
title: Syrian Government Nears Control of Enclave Hit by Suspected Chemical Attack
text:
The Syrian government is close to taking full control of a rebel enclave near the capital just days after an alleged chemical weapons attack there sparked international outrage and calls for a retaliatory strike against the Assad regime.
French President Emmanuel Macron said there is proof the regime used chemical weapons last weekend in the rebel-held city of Douma, the biggest town in Eastern Ghouta, though he didnâ€™t give details of the proof or how it was obtained.
